title: FF! Doc | LarvaPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

LarvaPipe
Pipes
Call Larva Test Tool
See also
Github - LarvaPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.LarvaPipe
Syntax
Copy
<LarvaPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
writeToLog	boolean	false
writeToSystemOut	boolean	false
execute	text	-
The scenario sub directory to execute
logLevel	options	wrong pipeline messages
The larva log level: one of [debug], [pipeline messages prepared for diff], [pipeline messages], [wrong pipeline messages prepared for diff], [wrong pipeline messages], [step passed/failed], [scenario passed/failed], [scenario failed], [totals], [error]
Available Options: DEBUG, PIPELINE_MESSAGES_PREPARED_FOR_DIFF, PIPELINE_MESSAGES, INFO, WRONG_PIPELINE_MESSA
